title: GoBruteforcer Botnet Targets Crypto Project Databases by Exploiting Weak Credentials
full_text: GoBruteforcer Botnet Targets Crypto Project Databases by Exploiting Weak Credentials. A new wave of GoBruteforcer attacks has targeted databases of cryptocurrency and blockchain projects to co-opt them into a botnet that's capable of brute-forcing user passwords for services such as FTP, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and phpMyAdmin on Linux servers. "The….
